channel.title: Botting Done?
channel.description:
Title was just to get your attention, I know we'll adapt, but..
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/bot-busting-and-bonuses-for-all
They sound pretty serious about it, thoughts?

item.title: Botting Done?
item.dc:creator: @soul_raever soul raever
item.description:
@soul_raever wrote:

Frell:

But I mean could someones program ever be categorized like property like a car? Where if someone hotwires your car/someone hotwires client

it’s classed as intellectual property
unauthorized use of code can be classed as stealing and the such…

Read full topic

@NewbieNewty wrote:

Frell:

But I mean could someones program ever be categorized like property like a car? Where if someone hotwires your car/someone hotwires client

item.title: Botting Done?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Frell:

is it possible Jagex consulted Oracle or Sun about this? And now the only way to bot the client again is in fact illegal?

They could consult whoever they want, a civil matter can never magically turn into a criminal offense, ever. Period.

Read full topic

item.title: Botting Done?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:108, topic:419006”][quote author=t4 link=topic=521535.msg3799374#msg3799374 date=1319908235]

is it possible Jagex consulted Oracle or Sun about this? And now the only way to bot the client again is in fact illegal?

right because some big company like oracles gives two flying fucks about a kid’s game - in fact, they’d LAUGH at Jagex for their inability to stop something fairly simple for over 10 years.
[/quote]
If you could kindly give us a nice solution to “something fairly simple” I would greatly appreciate it. I think Jagex would too! Maybe they would offer you a job.[/quote]
Writing more parts of the client in native code, scrambling the IDs of entities by passing it through an algorithm that relies on information that is player specific (changed every update), better server-side triggers, making the game less of a grind…

Sure, some those examples aren’t 100% full proof, but it certainly would result in far less bots.

Read full topic

item.title: Botting Done?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:101, topic:419006”]http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/forums.ws?15,16,836,63317104,goto,4

Well, if they do it in 14~28 days as promised I’ll offer them jobs at Jagex, but then again, they said they would be backup in a few hours a few days ago.
Alternatively, instead of a career at Jagex or McDonalds if more relevant, they could more likely end up spending their time in those lovely orange jumpsuits with the nice writing on the back

EDIT: So many exciting possibilities, only time will tell.

Someone from here should really get their ass into gear and get a bot working and see if MMG is true to his word :o[/quote]

What’s annoying is that the players posting in that thread seem to worship that MMG guy. That’s like worshipping your local grocery bagger.

Read full topic

item.title: Botting Done?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:101, topic:419006”]http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/forums.ws?15,16,836,63317104,goto,4

Well, if they do it in 14~28 days as promised I’ll offer them jobs at Jagex, but then again, they said they would be backup in a few hours a few days ago.
Alternatively, instead of a career at Jagex or McDonalds if more relevant, they could more likely end up spending their time in those lovely orange jumpsuits with the nice writing on the back

EDIT: So many exciting possibilities, only time will tell.

Someone from here should really get their ass into gear and get a bot working and see if MMG is true to his word :o[/quote]

That guy is truly the scum of the earth. Funny jabs about working at McDonalds are one thing, but threats about going to prison? In no country in the entire world would that be a criminal offense. Depending on what the bot guys do, it could get them in civil trouble with Jagex, but it would never be criminal. They should cut out the ridiculous threats.

Read full topic
